椫字的基本解释

椫
（樿）
shàn
古书上说的一种树，木质坚硬，纹理白色，可做梳子、勺子等。

椫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shàn］
［《廣韻》旨善切，上獮，章。］
［《集韻》時戰切，去綫，禪。］
“椫1”的繁体字。
(1)木名。又名白理木。白纹，质坚，古时用以制梳、勺等器具。
(2)见“樿傍”。

椫字的康熙字典解释
椫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
椫字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树，木质坚硬，纹理白色。

Tilia
Basic explanation of words
Tilia
(Yi)
shàn
The tree mentioned in ancient books has hard wood and white texture. It can be used as combs and spoons.
Tilia
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shàn］
["Guangyun" aims to be good, first, chapter. ]
["Ji Yun" wars and cuts, goes to the line, Zen. ]
"椫1" in traditional characters.
(1) Wooden name. Also known as white wood. White grain, firm in quality, used to make combs, spoons and other utensils in ancient times.
(2) See "Yibang".
Tilia
